    void
    FinishedState.executeState(GameContext ctx)
    Executes the actions for the finished state, including displaying final scores, announcing the winner, and generating a game report if a ReportStrategy has been set in the ReportGenerator within the GameContext.
    void
    GameState.executeState(GameContext ctx)
    Executes the core logic of the current game state, including processing user input and performing necessary game operations.

    Executes the logic for the intro state.
